Question: After undergoing off-season elbow surgery, this person was idle for the first 14 games of the 1983 NFL season.
Hints: A representative for this person has since denied this report.
As of December 28, 2012, this person has made 50 appearances on the "The Tonight Show with Jay Leno".
In his 14-season career, this person completed 2,025 of 3,901 passes for 27,989 yards and 212 touchdowns.
